title: Wall St opens higher on upbeat earnings, healthcare boost
text:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 22.79 points, or 0.08 per cent, at the open to 26,850.43.

[NEW YORK] Wall Street opened higher on Tuesday after a batch of upbeat earnings reports eased concerns over domestic growth and the fallout from the U.S.-China trade war, while a surge in Biogen boosted the healthcare sector.

The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 22.79 points, or 0.08 per cent, at the open to 26,850.43.

The S&P 500 opened higher by 4.01 points, or 0.13 per cent, at 3,010.73. The Nasdaq Composite gained 25.14 points, or 0.31 per cent, to 8,188.12 at the opening bell.

REUTERS
description: : THE BUSINESS TIMES Stocks - [NEW YORK] Wall Street opened higher on Tuesday after a batch of upbeat earnings reports eased concerns over domestic growth and the fallout from the U.S.-China trade war, while a surge in Biogen boosted the healthcare sector. .
